mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM donations WHERE payment_status = 'COMPLETED'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volunteer_applications
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM welfare_diagnoses

SELECT member_id AS memberId, email AS userId, pwd, name, email, phone, role, birth, COALESCE(status, 'ACTIVE') AS status, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createdAt, DATE_FORMAT(last_login_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS lastLoginAt, DATE_FORMAT(updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS statusUpdatedAt FROM member ORDER BY CASE WHEN role = 'ADMIN' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, created_at DESC
SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, admin_id AS adminId, title, content, views, is_pinned AS isPinned, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt FROM notices ORDER BY is_pinned DESC, created_at DESC

SELECT f.faq_id AS faqId, fc.category_name AS category, f.question, f.answer, f.order_num AS orderNum, f.is_active AS isActive, DATE_FORMAT(f.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt FROM faqs f LEFT JOIN faq_categories fc ON f.category_id = fc.category_id ORDER BY f.order_num ASC, f.created_at DESC

SELECT d.donation_id AS donationId, d.member_id AS userId, d.amount, d.donation_type AS donationType, dc.category_name AS category, d.package_name AS packageName, d.donor_name AS donorName, d.donor_email AS donorEmail, d.donor_phone AS donorPhone, d.message, COALESCE(d.payment_method, 'CREDIT_CARD') AS paymentMethod, d.payment_status AS paymentStatus, DATE_FORMAT(d.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createdAt FROM donations d LEFT JOIN donation_categories dc ON d.category_id = dc.category_id ORDER BY d.created_at DESC

SELECT va.application_id AS applicationId, va.activity_id AS activityId, va.member_id AS userId, va.applicant_name AS applicantName, va.applicant_phone AS applicantPhone, va.applicant_email AS applicantEmail, va.applicant_address AS applicantAddress, va.selected_category AS selectedCategory, DATE_FORMAT(va.volunteer_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS volunteerDate, va.volunteer_time AS volunteerTime, va.status, va.assigned_facility_name AS assignedFacilityName, va.assigned_facility_address AS assignedFacilityAddress, va.assigned_facility_lat AS assignedFacilityLat, va.assigned_facility_lng AS assignedFacilityLng, va.admin_note AS adminNote, DATE_FORMAT(va.approved_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS approvedAt, act.activity_name AS activityName, DATE_FORMAT(va.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createdAt FROM volunteer_applications va LEFT JOIN volunteer_activities act ON va.activity_id = act.activity_id ORDER BY CASE va.status WHEN 'APPLIED' THEN 1 WHEN 'CONFIRMED' THEN 2 WHEN 'COMPLETED' THEN 3 WHEN 'REJECTED' THEN 4 WHEN 'CANCELLED' THEN 5 ELSE 6 END, va.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET status = 'DORMANT', deleted_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE email = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, email, name, status FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_id, email, name, status, role FROM member WHERE email = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE volunteer_applications SET status = 'CONFIRMED', approved_by = (SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE email = #{adminUserId} LIMIT 1), approved_at = NOW(), assigned_facility_name = #{facilityName}, assigned_facility_address = #{facilityAddress}, assigned_facility_lat = #{facilityLat, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, assigned_facility_lng = #{facilityLng, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, admin_note = #{adminNote} WHERE application_id = #{applicationId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM donations WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE() AND payment_status = 'COMPLETED'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volunteer_applications WHERE YEAR(volunteer_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(volunteer_date) = MONTH(CURDATE())
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) END as rate FROM volunteer_applications
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m.month_date, '%c월') as month, COALESCE(SUM(d.amount), 0) as amount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL n MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') as month_date FROM (SELECT 0 n UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5) numbers ) m LEFT JOIN donations d ON DATE_FORMAT(d.created_at, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(m.month_date, '%Y-%m') AND d.payment_status = 'COMPLETED' GROUP BY m.month_date ORDER BY m.month_date

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m.month_date, '%c월') as month, COUNT(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(mb.created_at, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(m.month_date, '%Y-%m') THEN 1 END) as new_members FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL n MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') as month_date FROM (SELECT 0 n UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5) numbers ) m LEFT JOIN member mb ON DATE_FORMAT(mb.created_at, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(m.month_date, '%Y-%m') GROUP BY m.month_date ORDER BY m.month_date

SELECT CASE selected_category WHEN 'ELDERLY' THEN '노인돌봄' WHEN 'CHILD' THEN '아동교육' WHEN 'ENVIRONMENT' THEN '환경보호' WHEN 'DISABLED' THEN '의료봉사' WHEN 'COMMUNITY' THEN '재난구호' WHEN 'EDUCATION' THEN '문화행사' ELSE '기타' END as category, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volunteer_applications) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM volunteer_applications) END as rate FROM volunteer_applications GROUP BY selected_category ORDER BY rate DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m.month_date, '%c월') as month, COUNT(v.application_id) as count FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL n MONTH), '%Y-%m-01') as month_date FROM (SELECT 0 n UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5) numbers ) m LEFT JOIN volunteer_applications v ON DATE_FORMAT(v.created_at, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(m.month_date, '%Y-%m') GROUP BY m.month_date ORDER BY m.month_date

SELECT CASE payment_method WHEN 'CREDIT_CARD' THEN '신용카드' WHEN 'BANK_TRANSFER' THEN '계좌이체' WHEN 'KAKAO_PAY' THEN '카카오페이' WHEN 'NAVER_PAY' THEN '네이버페이' WHEN 'TOSS_PAY' THEN '토스페이' ELSE '기타' END as method, COUNT(*) as count FROM donations WHERE payment_status = 'COMPLETED' GROUP BY payment_method ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT '기부' as service_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM donations WHERE payment_status = 'COMPLETED' UNION ALL SELECT '봉사' as service_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM volunteer_applications UNION ALL SELECT '복지진단' as service_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM welfare_diagnoses UNION ALL SELECT '복지지도' as service_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM favorite_welfare_services

SELECT dc.category_name as category, COALESCE(SUM(d.amount), 0) as amount FROM donation_categories dc LEFT JOIN donations d ON dc.category_id = d.category_id AND d.payment_status = 'COMPLETED' WHERE dc.is_active = TRUE AND dc.display_order <= 9 GROUP BY dc.category_id, dc.category_name, dc.display_order ORDER BY dc.display_order ASC

SELECT va.application_id AS applicationId, va.member_id AS memberId, m.email AS userEmail, va.applicant_name AS applicantName, va.selected_category AS selectedCategory, DATE_FORMAT(va.volunteer_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS volunteerDate, va.volunteer_time AS volunteerTime, va.status, va.assigned_facility_name AS assignedFacilityName, va.assigned_facility_address AS assignedFacilityAddress, va.admin_note AS adminNote FROM volunteer_applications va LEFT JOIN member m ON va.member_id = m.member_id WHERE va.application_id = #{applicationId}
mapper.update: UPDATE volunteer_applications SET status = 'COMPLETED' WHERE status = 'CONFIRMED' AND CONCAT(volunteer_date, ' ', CASE volunteer_time WHEN 'MORNING' THEN '12:00:00' WHEN 'AFTERNOON' THEN '18:00:00' WHEN 'EVENING' THEN '22:00:00' ELSE '23:59:59' END) < NOW()
